data.title: 从Shin Keisei Line领取遗失物品的完美指南
data.meta_description: Online Lost And Found Agency in Japan. With Just One Online Rerport, we will find your item on your behalf and it will be returned to you so quick and easy.
data.text:
描述

How to claim item

There are two ways for claiming lost items.

1, Go to the station where your item is kept and pick up.

2, Cash-on Shipment to your home.

How to report item

Shin Keisei Electric Railway does not accept reports, so you have to call them to confirm.

They do not contact you after the item has been found.

Storage period

After a certain period of storage, the lost properties will be transferred to the police station with jurisdiction.

Notes

Lost items cannot be transferred from "the station where it is kept" to "your desired stations" in any case.

Shipping procedures cannot be performed over the phone.
